i5.las2peer.security

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlAble, MessageReceiver, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupAgent, PassphraseAgent

    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlAble, java.lang.Cloneable, MessageReceiver
    An Agent is the basic acting entity in the LAS2peer network. At the moment, an agent can represent a simple user, a group, a service or a monitoring agent.

      • getResponsibleForAgentId

        public long getResponsibleForAgentId()
        Returns the id of this agent. This method is only implemented, since an Agent is also a MessageReceiver, thus has to implement this method. It was written for the Mediator class.
        Specified by:
        getResponsibleForAgentId in interface MessageReceiver
        Returns:
        id of the agent

      • getPublicKey

      • returnSecretKey

        public javax.crypto.SecretKey returnSecretKey(byte[] crypted)
                                       throws L2pSecurityException,
                                              SerializationException,
                                              CryptoException
        Uses the CryptoTools to decrypt the passed crypted content with the agent's private key.
        Returns:
        a SecretKey decrypted from the crypted input and the agent's private key
        Throws:
        L2pSecurityException - the private key has not been unlocked yet
        CryptoException
        SerializationException

      • createSignature

        public java.security.Signature createSignature()
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                               L2pSecurityException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Uses the CryptoTools to create a java.security.Signature and initializes the object for signing with the agent's private key.
        Returns:
        a java.security.Signature
        Throws:
        L2pSecurityException - the private key has not been unlocked yet
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • signContent

        public byte[] signContent(byte[] plainData)
                   throws CryptoException,
                          L2pSecurityException
        Uses the CryptoTools to sign the passed data with the agent's private key.
        Returns:
        a signed version of the input
        Throws:
        L2pSecurityException - the private key has not been unlocked yet
        CryptoException

      • createFromXml

        public static Agent createFromXml(java.lang.String xml)
                           throws MalformedXMLException
        Factory: Create an agent from its XML string representation. Depending on the type attribute of the root node, the type will be a UserAgent, GroupAgent, ServiceAgent. Creation of MonitoringAgents is not supported.
        Parameters:
        xml -
        Returns:
        an agent
        Throws:
        MalformedXMLException
